scripts.autoprefix:css: echo 'Autoprefixing...' && yarn postcss dist/*.css --no-map --use autoprefixer -d dist
scripts.build: yarn build:ts && yarn build:css && yarn build:txt
scripts.build:ts: yarn build:clean && yarn build:compile && yarn build:check
scripts.build:css: yarn build:sass && yarn autoprefix:css && yarn concat:sass
scripts.build:sass: echo 'Building sass...' && node-sass src/theme_light.scss dist/theme_light.css --output-style compressed && node-sass src/theme_dark.scss dist/theme_dark.css --output-style compressed && node-sass src/theme_only_light.scss dist/theme_only_light.css --output-style compressed && node-sass src/theme_only_dark.scss dist/theme_only_dark.css --output-style compressed
scripts.build:watch: echo 'Watching build...' && yarn build:clean && yarn build:css && tsc -p ./tsconfig.json -w
